comments.body:
If we want to add a new API to KafkaFuture, there needs to be a KIP for that.

In any case, I don't think we need a new API for this.  You can just use `thenApply`, right?

Please see my other comment below.

The `copyWith` API is only added in `KafkaFutureImpl`, not in `KafkaFuture`, so I think adding it would not require a KIP.
